//Add 5 integers without using variables and their sum.
public class Integerwithoutusingvariable {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("Sum of five integers without variables:");
		System.out.println(1+2+3+4+5);
		

	}

}

Output:
Sum of five integers without variables:
15
